Text: I would like this with swedish subs

I would love to have subs... but I was limited with the software I was using when I made this. I'm in the process of learing a new prog that will enable me to include subs. So until then your on your own...

[bsc: I would like this with swedish subs]

- You are getting a movie for FREE, and still u are complaining with your fu**ing swedish subs.. !? 
How about coming up with a better copy then - ungrateful fuck !
I hate subs... And there are plenty of programms which you can use to add your subs by yourselves! I mean not everyone is swedish, some might want for example french or norwegian!

thanks for the efford manndrine

just some full disclosure for anyone downloading: this is in stereo lpcm, not dd2.0, 4:3 letterbox, not 16:9 widescreen, and since this is a dvd to xvid to dvd conversion, the picture is a bit soft.  I'd had spent more space on the disc for picture rather than adding a photo gallery and trailer, stuff you could download anyway :)

still, a good option for anyone wanting to watch on the tee vee without an xvid player.
